name: Pond Hub
description:
Made for Team Dogpit's Virtual Pet Jam; Pond Hub is a game about taking care of ducks at your very own duck pond! The game was developed by a team of three people in a duration of two weeks.
  Enjoy this wholesome game experience with adorable, customizable ducks, while listening to a relaxing original soundtrack. Quack Tips: 

- Don't let your ducks stray too far towards the edges, use the stick to herd them back to the safe zone

- Happy ducks are less likely to run away, feed and pet your duck to gain trust

- Give your ducks fancy accessories

- Collect eggs to gain currency

 - Decorate your pond with decorations from the shop

- Uncheck "Realtime clock" in settings to experience a full day cycle faster



  Credits: 

Music - Petter Moland (YouTube) 

Art & Animation - Marie Jacobsen (Twitter) 

 Programming - Jonas Odden (Itch page) 

 Sound Effects & Ambience - Soundly 

SOUNDTRACK: 

Currently known bugs: Currently we do not have any reported bugs! Make sure to tell us if you come across some! If we update the game, don't worry! The save file will be kept safe!
